Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A total of 66 children from 16 Pediatric Oncology Group institutions with " standard - risk " acute lymphoblastic leukemia , 1 . 00 to 9 . 99 years at diagnosis , without evidence of CNS leukemia at diagnosis were enrolled on ACCL0131 : 28 from P9201 and 38 from P9605 .

Let's think step by step.

1. Acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) - This is the primary disease entity mentioned in the paragraph. It is a type of cancer that affects the bone marrow and blood, specifically the production of white blood cells called lymphocytes.
2. CNS leukemia - This is also a type of leukemia, but it specifically refers to leukemia that affects the central nervous system. It is mentioned as a condition that was not present at diagnosis for the children enrolled in the study.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) |
| CNS leukemia |
